name: Moondrops [demo]
description:
Moondrops is a fairly simple rpg maker project that has an emphasis on story progression and optional content that can be found through choices, exploration, and experimentation.

Fifty years ago, the moon began to pulse. Shortly after, the children began to change. You play as a kid known as Izzy, who is trying their best to get used to their new lifestyle in an apartment complex in a city alongside their friends. Wander around town, visit friends, and try your best to not get into trouble. Or do, it's up to you.

As an in-progress practice project, current music and sound effects are either incomplete or are placeholders, there isn't any battle mechanics [yet], and there are likely some hiccups still in there.
